text: "Everybody Knows" is a song written by Canadian singer-songwriter Leonard Cohen and collaborator Sharon Robinson. It has often been covered and used in soundtracks. "Everybody Knows" was first released on Cohen's album I'm Your Man, February 1988. The lyrics include references to AIDS,Stephen Scobie, Intricate preparations: writing Leonard Cohen, ECW Press, 2000, , p. 123. social problems,Maurice Ratcliff, The complete guide to the music of Leonard Cohen, Omnibus Press, 1999, , p. 81. and relationship and religious issues.Barry Alan Farber, Rock 'n' roll wisdom: what psychologically astute lyrics teach about life and love, Greenwood Publishing Group, 2007, , p. 25. A cover of the song by Sigrid plays during the opening credits of Justice League. ==References== Category:1988 songs Category:Leonard Cohen songs Category:Don Henley songs Category:Songs written by Leonard Cohen
